blueprint.description: Installs Glances (a top/htop alternative) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Glances](https://github.com/nicolargo/glances) is a cross-platform monitoring tool which aims to present a maximum of information in a minimum of space through a curses or a web interface. It can adapt the displayed information depending on the terminal size dynamically. It is a top/htop alternative for Linux, BSD, macOS, and even Windows.
blueprint.name: Glances
blueprint.title: Glances
